name: The Marketing Book Podcast
seeking: The Marketing Book Podcast serves marketers, business owners, and entrepreneurs seeking marketing and business success strategies, making it an ideal JV partner for book publishers, marketing course creators, or business tool vendors who want access to a highly targeted B2B audience. They would benefit from co-promotion with other marketing or business-growth podcasts, as well as affiliate arrangements with marketing software or training programs. A sponsorship or affiliate deal with a marketing technology company or online business education platform would be the most direct fit.
who_you_serve: Marketers, business owners, and entrepreneurs seeking marketing book insights and business success strategies.
what_you_do: Review marketing books and interview authors on business growth strategies through podcast.
offering: Marketing Book Podcast featuring author interviews and marketing strategy book reviews
business_focus: Review marketing books and interview authors on business growth strategies through podcast.
